turns.user_message: I need details on qualifications and availability.
turns.assistant_message:
When looking for a nurse for your father, consider these qualification details:
- Certifications (RN, LPN)
- Experience in geriatric care
- Background checks
- First aid/CPR training

For availability, ask about:
- Scheduling flexibility
- Shift options
- Weekend coverage
